Мастер фраза для определения максимально: He was taken by punitive forces to the medical bui
quests_Литгер по неосторожности продал Д:
Litger inadvertently sold Derek
explosive ingot instead of life ingot
(they are very similar in color).
Why Litger now has to pay
damage in the amount of 6 health bars.
quests_Дерек, перебирая слитки в своей к:
Derek, sorting through the bars in his room,
accidentally hit an explosive ingot and lost
most of his property, along with face.
quests_Заставить Литгера компенсировать:
Make Litger compensate for the damage to 
Derek.
quests_Риом перед лекцией решил посетить:
Before the lecture, Riom decided to visit the 
arena, where practiced fencing Sidrin Ruri, 
his father.
Having greeted his son, Sidrin invited him to 
conduct a full-fledged sparring session.
If Riom agrees, then his father will give him 
a pyrite sword as a reward.
quests_Ирей готов простить Риома за его:
Irey is ready to forgive Riom for his rudeness.
In return, the young reaper must help the 
Werolomgers with the search for his assistant,
Weiler. Reaper helped Irey with presentations
research and locations, and soon
he disappeared for a while.
Find a clue in the archive.
quests_Проверить личную комнату Вейлера:
Check Weiler's private room in
Eastern region.
quests_Поговорить с Зедом в Центре Чисти: Talk to Zed in the Purgatory Center.
Go down to the underground complex.
quests_Найти жнеца в подземном комплексе: Find the reaper in the underground complex.
quests_Покинуть комплекс (жнец должен вы: Leave the complex (the reaper must survive).
quests_Проснувшись от сна, Риому Рури пр:
Waking up from sleep, Riom Ruri had to
attend instruction in the Ricard lecture hall.
But there was a lot of time left before the briefing,
you need to occupy yourself with something.
quests_Задание отряда заключалась в пров:
The task of the detachment was to check one
from the Jagged Canyon areas for the presence of 
a base the Risens.
Reconnaissance is prohibited from entering combat.
Any data found must be transferred punitive corps.
Now Riom needs to meet his comrades.
quests_Придя на место Риом и Кенчиру наш:
Arriving at the place, Riom and Kenchiru found 
their squad... Someone killed all the reapers.
It's worth exploring the battlefield to find clues
or survivors.
quests_В ходе поисков Риом нашел уцелевш:
During the search, Riom found the surviving reaper 
- Rita. From her he learns that the detachment of 
Rivalsers Ricard's order remained to set the point
teleport, and the commander himself and the group 
went further on exploration.
After some time, a group of reapers with Rita
Devastators attacked. When Riom approached the 
wounded woman girl, he was attacked by reapers 
from the punitive housings. The current head is 
Krais Schneiden, conducts clearing the canyon 
from devastators and opinion - Rita killed her 
own squad. Riom with Kenchiru decided to 
deliver the survivor to the headquarters of the 
Werolomgers... The higher reapers themselves 
will decide what to do with her. Need to just get 
to headquarters.
quests_Суд признал Риту невиновной и вын:
The court found Rita innocent and passed a 
sentence on Krais.
Now the mistress of Purgatory, Death, will decide
whether Ricard will regain his previous title or 
not. In the meantime, Riom must report to the 
Punisher headquarters and talk to Ricard when 
he returns.
quests_Крайс получил наказание и на его:
Krais received his punishment and in his place
Ricard came.
He told Riom about the increased activity
the longtime enemy of Purgatory - the Risen.
devastators, creations of Vlur-Stig,
are also getting stronger every month and
angrier.
Purgatory is actively preparing for war.
For Riom Ruri, Commander Rikard prepared
something special. Need to meet with
Kaspar in the corridor of the Punisher 
headquarters, he will escort Riom to the armory.
quests_Каспар привел Риома в оружейную,:
Caspar brought Riom to the armory where
artifacts. A mysterious and very powerful weapon.
Anyone who touches it will be exposed
test.
quests_Риом чудом остался жив... Его дос:
Riom miraculously survived...
He was taken by punitive forces to the medical 
building. While Riom was passed out, the reapers 
discovered a large detachment of Risens on the 
border between Silver Desert and Jagged Canyon.
The battle reapers are about to leave for battle.
Punishers will also take part.
Ricard gathers a large detachment for 
a briefing and Riom must come to it as soon 
as possible.
quests_Навестить Сидрина Рури в Северном:
Visit Sidrin Ruri in Northern
area of Purgatory.
quests_Найти кладовщика Дерека в Северо-:
Find Storekeeper Derek in
Northeast region of Purgatory.
quests_Найти кладовщика Литгера в Восточ:
Find storekeeper Litger in Eastern area of 
Purgatory.
Catch up with Ricard's reconnaissance squad.
quests_Доставить Риту в штаб Вероломгеро:
Deliver Rita to the Werolomgers 
headquarters.
quests_Встретиться с Ирни Мерсалессом в:
Meet Irni Mersaless in the room next to 
Ricard's office.
quests_Отправиться в оружейную с Каспаро: Go to the armory with Kaspar.
quests_Время делу, попойке час!: Time for business, time for drinking!
quests_Встреча Риом с отрядом Ирни Мерса:
Riom's meeting with Irni Mersaless's squad
turned into a protracted drinking binge.
One of the reapers, Lady Rose, mixed the liquid
milit with brandy for a dozen bottles.
The road of fun led the whole
detachment in the corps of combat reapers.
Irni asked Riom to get one of the
War Reaper Relics in Laurita's Room.
When asked for specifics, he replied:
”Delicate, silky, soft, lurking
in one of a thousand chests, Laurita
wears them only in moonlight among
stars, before plunging into the endless
sea."
quests_После сокрушительного поражения,:
After a crushing defeat, Riom
managed to survive.
But now the reaper is stuck in an unknown to him
section of the canyon. devastators are everywhere 
and the only chance of salvation is teleport, or
a road leading to a safer place.
quests_Как оказалось, единственный спосо:
As it turned out, the only way to leave
the canyon abyss is a teleport. It's in working
condition, but without power. This problem can be
solved by changing the battery. Riom will have
to get it somewhere and get to the teleport
alive.
quests_Найти способ выбраться из Пропаст: Find a way to get out of the Abyss.
quests_Раздобыть батарейку и активироват: Get a battery and activate the teleport.
quests_По пути к выходу из северного рай:
On the way to the exit from the northern area of 
Jugged Canyon Riom met a freaky reaper Tini.
His detachment set up outposts and mining 
points near caves with resources.
But devastators attacked the group of engineers 
and killed everyone except Tini.
The reaper tried to get out of the canyon, but 
due to fear of such a fierce enemy, he decided
to hide and hope for a miracle.
Tiny told about the teleport not far from his
camp and that the device might be
de-energized. It is possible to restore power 
using a battery.
To help Riom, the engineer shared with him
battery drawing.

On the way to the exit from the northern area of 
Jugged Canyon Riom met a freaky reaper Tini.
His detachment set up outposts and mining 
points near caves with resources.
But devastators attacked the group of engineers 
and killed everyone except Tini.
The reaper tried to get out of the canyon, but 
due to fear of such a fierce enemy, he decided
to hide and hope for a miracle.
Tiny told about the teleport not far from his
camp and that the device might be
de-energized. It is possible to restore power 
using a battery.
Riom, along with Tini, goes in search of the
battery.
quests_Северная область зубчатого каньон:
Northern area of the Jagged 
Canyon
quests_Исследуя каньон, Риом обнаружил и:
While exploring the canyon, Riom discovered
Reaper Engineer Research Squad led by 
captain Ilnara.
They were looking for a very rare material in the 
underground sections - a fragment of hierarchite. 
The bodies of Hierarchs, demigods who serve 
the Creator of all living things, are made of this 
material. One of these minions is now in 
Purgatory - Irei. A long time ago he received 
serious wounds and had to be patched up with 
a cheap and accessible material - pyrite. 
The one who was equated with the High Reapers
decided to restore what was lost, with the hands 
of his subordinates...

While exploring the canyon, Riom discovered
research squad of reaper engineers in
led by captain Ilnara. One of her
subordinate, Brix, is seriously injured. I have to
get a healing ingot somewhere...
quests_Риом успешно добрался до своей це:
Riom successfully reached his goal,
but the connection with Ilnara was interrupted...
Neither she nor anyone from her squad
They answer Riom. Something is clearly wrong 
here.
quests_Когда Риом вернулся, чтобы узнать:
When Riom returned to find out
what happened to Ilnara’s detachment - a find
was terrifying.
The entire outpost was blown away by 
a hurricane. There is blood and bodies of 
devastators everywhere, but not a single reaper
body. The fate of Ilnara's squad is unknown...
Get to the top of the cliff.
quests_Принести раненому Брикс слиток ле: Bring a healing ingot to the wounded Brix.
Return to the top of the cliff.
quests_После победы над огромным опустош:
After defeating the great devastator,
Riom teleported to one of the
observation points. He turned out to be clean
destroyed. Now the reaper has to find
a path that will lead him out of the South Canyon.
quests_Северный каньон оказался напрочь:
The North Canyon turned out to be completely 
filled with wild devastators. There's almost no 
one around surviving reaper. Either they don't 
stay here, or hide in places where the 
devastators will not reach them. Besides, Riom
discovered the place where, according 
to Koeltan, there is brittle rock. 
Behind her, like usually there is a passage...
but where does it lead? 
To check this you will have to find a way go down.
In addition, Koeltan asked him to look into the 
illusory world, in a safe place.
He will teach Riom new things welcome.
quests_Теперь дорога к одной из баз в Во:
Now the road to one of the bases in the Eastern 
region open. Riom was able to defeat the “trinity”
of wild devastators who stood between him and
teleport. Wild and unexplored terrain left behind.
Next place more studied, but no less dangerous.
quests_Изучить навык Теневого разреза в:
Learn the Shadow Cut skill in an abandoned 
reaper camp.
Find a way to descend safely.
quests_По словам Риты, Риом ещё не до ко:
According to Rita, Riom has not yet fully 
recovered from received injuries. There are no
physical wounds on the body, but the nervous 
system has not fully recovered. The medical 
building does not have enough for such a 
procedure. equipment, so Rita brought the 
young reaper to your laboratory.
quests_Рита смогла восстановить нервную:
Rita was able to restore Riom's nervous system.
As it turned out, nerve damage threatened the 
young the reaper is vulnerable to mental control.
Riom also learned the nature of healing magic
Rita - demonic connection with succubi. Into 
the body The girls are implanted with demon 
flesh - the spine. Rita did not voice all the details,
except that she is accidentally in the world of 
the Living came across a succubus and the 
demoness spent flesh synthesis procedure. 
Rita periodically hears voices from the Underworld,
but they do not help no impact on her. 
Rita told about her secret, but in return she made 
a deal with Riom - he will keep her secret a secret
and if she tells someone without Rita's consent,
he will die.
quests_Как только Риом добрался до Лабир:
Once Riom reached the Labyrinth, he
met the surviving reaper Avel. It consists
in the “Scavengers” building and arrived in the 
area a labyrinth for collecting fallen reapers.
A scavenger dismembers a dead man's body,
stores the limbs in a special box and
next is organic material
teleports to Purgatory. Avel too
weak for fighting, so he asked Ryoma for
help. Help him or leave him alone
arbitrariness of fate is Ryoma's personal choice.
quests_Риом продолжает двигаться в сторо:
Riom continues to move towards the south
 canyon, where most of the
surviving reapers. On the way, he learned from 
Irey, that several dozen reapers survived
recent massacre and are stuck in the “Labyrinth”.
In a place where it is easy to get lost and run into
dangerous enemy. Riomu needs it as much as 
possible quickly find the reapers before the 
devastators done this before...
quests_Вольф, командир боевых жнецов, ра:
Wolf, commander of the battle reapers, said, that 
his squad will be ready to move out after how 
Riom will help heal the wounded.
To do this, 30 life bars will be enough.
All that remains is to find them and give them 
to Wolf. Further you need to contact the medical 
corps and request the help of a reaper with good
healing abilities. As soon as a medic will arrive at 
the squad, everyone will be needed escort to 
the outpost and activate there protective barrier. 
After complete battle reapers will be able to 
restore join the rest of the squads in south canyon.
quests_Довести отряд Лауриты до лагеря р:
Bring Laurita's squad to the camp of wounded 
reapers.
quests_Найти способ активировать защитны: Find a way to activate the protective barrier.
